subject: Coaches and Managers
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: After a departure from Buffalo 16 years ago that was filled with feuds between coaches, management and some players, Ted Nolan returned Friday night as the interim coach of the Sabres.
snippet: After a departure from Buffalo 16 years ago that was filled with feuds between coaches, management and some players, Ted Nolan returned Friday night as the interim coach of the Sabres.
